guide.conclusion: These custom earmuffs are simple to make and comfortable to wear.

guide.introduction_rendered:
Relevant parts
  • Small, sports-themed hollow ball
  • Headband
  • Cotton stuffing
  • Fabric
  • Small headphone speakers
Tools
  • Fabric/craft glue
  • Rubber band
  • Sewing kit
  • Sharp knife

lines.text: Cut sports-themed ball in half with the sharp knife. Cut small slits on top of each half big enough for the headband to slide through and fit snugly.
lines.text_raw: Cut sports-themed ball in half with the sharp knife. Cut small slits on top of each half big enough for the headband to slide through and fit snugly.

lines.text: Secure headband by wrapping a rubber band on each side of the headband within each half of the ball to ensure that the headband does not slide out.
lines.text_raw: Secure headband by wrapping a rubber band on each side of the headband within each half of the ball to ensure that the headband does not slide out.

lines.text: Add the stuffing to the inside of each half of the ball.
lines.text_raw: Add the stuffing to the inside of each half of the ball.

lines.text: Wrap the fabric around the opening of each half of the ball. Secure it to the ball's inside edge with fabric glue and let it dry.
lines.text_raw: Wrap the fabric around the opening of each half of the ball. Secure it to the ball's inside edge with fabric glue and let it dry.

lines.text: Your warm, sporty earmuffs are ready to wear!
lines.text_raw: Your warm, sporty earmuffs are ready to wear!

lines.text: Sew a small pocket into the fabric before securing it on the half of the ball.
lines.text_raw: Sew a small pocket into the fabric before securing it on the half of the ball.

lines.text: Place the headphone speakers into the pocket and sew around them to hold them in position.
lines.text_raw: Place the headphone speakers into the pocket and sew around them to hold them in position.

lines.text: Glue the fabric as in Step 4 with the headphone cords downward.
lines.text_raw: Glue the fabric as in Step 4 with the headphone cords downward.
